text: w'idha qil lilmuminin alkhayfyn min allh: ma aladhi 'anzal allah ealaa alnabii muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm? qalu: 'anzal allah ealayh alkhayr walhda. liladhin amanuu biallah warasulih fi hadhih aldnya, wdaeawa eibad allah 'iilaa al'iiman waleamal alsalh, makrumat kabirat min alnasr lahum fi aldnya, wsaeat alrzq, wladar alakhirat lahum khayr wa'aezam mimaa 'uwtwh fi aldnya, wlaniem dar almutaqin alkhayfyn min allah alakhrtu
